sections.heading: Perspective: Top-Down vs. Street View
sections.body:
Choose a single **camera** per scene:
- **Top-Down:** map-like turns (great for CL:3 routes).
- **Street View:** character eye level (great for RS dialogue and CA).

callouts.title: Lock the Camera
callouts.body: Donâ€™t switch perspectives mid-scene. If needed, insert a clear **VV CUT** first.

microCheck.q: Best way to change perspective mid-story:
options: Use a VV cut (pause + snap) then continue

sections.heading: Partner Practice: 3-Beat Spatial Story
sections.body:
Co-create a **3-beat** story using your anchors. Include **1 CL:3 route**, **1 CL:1 action**, and **1 RS line**. Example beats:
1) **PAST**: **CL:3 HOMEâ†’SCHOOL.**
2) **NEXT**: **RSâ†’FRIEND:** **HELP?** (neutral) **CL:1 WE WALK GYM.**
3) **FUTURE**: **GAME START FINISH.**

callouts.title: Anchor Drift
callouts.body: If STORE slides, re-point once, then continue.
